content:
Paapi! Unaruka nee-anuthaapatthinnaayu
Tharamullllappoll kanneeraal neduveerppaal nee
Maalinyangalle maayikka

Vegam kshamanedaa-nundaagrahamengkil
Daivasamaksham-sangkadapoorvvam kezhuka ni-
Nnaparaadhangalle maayikkum.

Narareppaapatthin-daasyatthe neekki
Samrakshichon-kartthaavortthaal veeran thaan
Sarvvaadhipathe! Sthothramthe.

Ollivil cheythoren-malinathakalleyortthu
Illakeedunnen-manujasnehee! Sarvveshaa!
Kanivenmel thonneedaname

Mrthiyum yaathanayum-vaazhaatthoridatthil
Paarppikkaname nin parishuddhanmaaroppam
Mrthare shobhanashaalakallil

Noothanamaam sthuthiyum-vimalasthothramathum
Nalkunnengall sakaleshaa! Sthuthiyennevam
Nyangallaho ghoshikkunnu.

Thanne varnnicheedaanenne-kanyavillichaall
/tathbhutharoopam chithrithamaakkaan
/tnalkuka naathhaa! Athbhuthabhaavam
Nin vaazhvaalen kinnaravaadyam-nedum menma.

Pethgomo:-vaanilumoozhiyiledanilum-haaleluyyaa
Bhaagyavathi! Ninnormmadinam-paramolkrshdam
Ninperunnaall dinamathirodathirollam-ramaneeyam
Pallllikallil dayaraakallilum-sthuthiyuyarunnu
Aazhiyumoozhiyumulltthellivaal-sthothram cheyyunnu.
/tnin perunnaall-thannil sthuthipaadaan
/tunarvengall-kkekiyorunarvullllon
Svargadharithreevaasikallaa-ladhikam sthyan thaan.

Mooshaanibikanye! Ninne mullttharuvaayum
Haskീyelbandhichoru kathakaayum-darshichu
Sveshdatthodu vachanam Daivam-kaalatthikavil
Jaatham cheythidumennangariyichaan-grabeeyel
/tsthuthiyettam-vinayappettone!
/tsthuthi manasaa-maanavanaayone!
Rakshakane! Sthuthinin perkkaay-sthuthipaadunnu sabha

Dhanye! Ninpraarththhanamevatte nyangallodonni-
Charththhanakettittekeedatte punyam naathhan.

Ee lokatthil purushaantaramaayu nilkkunnollaar
Aandhyattheyi srshdikalleennum rodhichollaar
Mariyaamthanne thanmukhamortthaal shobhaapoornnam
Bhaashikkumpoll chundukallinnum sooryanudippoo.

Paarinmaarge jeevan choriyum shoshappaaye!
Praarththhanaye nee daivasamakshattharppichaalum
Thannudayonum thannandananum daivavumaayon
Yaathanayetton krpacheyyanamennavallarththhikkum.

Ompathumaasam ninneyettoll than praarththhanayaal
Daivaathmajane kopatthin dandozhivaakkenam

Veeryam dhanyar sahaderkkekiya veeran dhanyan
/tormmadinatthe maanichengum
/tmahimaavettam chertthon dhanyan
Avaril poornnasneham samsthhaapichon dhanyan

Kaarunyanidhe! Naathhaa! Dhaarmmikaradiyaar
Yaathanayelppathukandiha nee-veruthe nilkkukayo
Eshaayaa yohannaanmaar-hatharaay, daavee-
Dettaan peedakall, daaneeyeline veezhtthi kuzhiyil
/tsakhariyaa aalayamathil baliyaayu
/tvidhinilaye shaniyumaathmajarum
Peedithar thanvidhi naathhaa!-nyangademel kaniyaname

Nyaayaadhipamandiramaarnno-raa sahadenmaar
Krooshithanil ninnaayudhamaathmeeyam-praapichu
Vishvaasathhairyatthaalaa drdhachitthanmaar
Dandanamampe kandittum ninnu nirbhayaraay
/tbhoovijayavum divimahimayumaarnnaar
/tnammudeyaathmaakkallkkavarkotta
Avarthanchirakil cherkkuka-nyangalleyeesho-krpayaal

Ishdanmaar than praarththhanayaal
Kartthaave! Krpa cheyyaname
Thalpraarththhanayaal yaachanayaal
Anpaathmaakkallilundaaka.

Nin vrtthaantam roohaayaal
Chonnoraam nibi shleehanmaar
snehaal mrtharaam sahadenmaar
praarththhikkum krpacheyyenam

Kartthaavinnishdam cheythaar
Nirmmalare! Praarththhicheeduvin
nyangallil ninnum neengeedaan
kopatthinnadiyum dandum

Ishdanmaar than praarththhanayaal
Kartthaave! Krpa cheyyaname
Thalpraarththhanayaal yaachanayaal
Anpaathmaakkallilundaaka.

Neethiparanmaar maddhyekashdam nyaan thunayatton
/tsanmaargam nyaan sheelichilla
/thaa! Nyaananyan thalperunnaallil
En dushkrthyam paayicheedunnavareennenne.

Pethgomo:-roohaathan kinnaramaayon-haaleluyyaa
Daaveedeeshaayisuthan-sthuthigeethatthaal
Enneyunartthiyezhunnelppi-churacheythaanevam
Maanavane! Entinurangu-nnezhunnelkkuka nee
Kaazhchakoduppathu vidhinaathhanu-raavin naduvilthaan
/tpraarththhanayaal mochanamarththhikka
/tnaathhanu kanneeril preethiparam
Raapakal vaathil thurannettidu-mudayon dukhithare

Enchintaye raavilunartthuka-daivathanoojaa!
Ninkarunaykkum prabhuthaykkum-sthothram cheythiduvaan
Paapaabdhiyilenneyamartthaan-karuthum dushdan
Sthuthi paadaayvaan mukkunne enneyaho nidrayathil
/tuththhithanaayu sthothram cheythiduvaan
/tnathiyodunin karunaasharanatthil
Thellivodu naathhaa! Sthuthiyennaartthiduvaan-tharika balam

Vaanavar thanneeshaa-maanavar thangathiye
Ee shushrooshayeye-ttaardratha thonnenam.

Maartthommaa! Panditha vaidyaa! Rogaarttharkkaayu
Saukhyamiyattiduvaanadhikaaram the!-nalkiparan
Paartthaal ninnasthhikallathre nyangallkkabhayam
Nyangade yaachana nin praarththhana-yaal nalkeedatte.
/taarogyam vyaadhigrastharkkum
/tvishraamam peeditha janathaykkum
Kshama nyangallkkum prathyaagamanam-doorasthharkkum

Maayaruthe kartthaave!-nin varavuvare
Sabhayude makkallil maartthommaa shleehaa thannormma
Devaalaya dayaraakallila-arppikkenam
Desham thorum naanaadishakallilum sthuthimenmel
/tvinnavaraam eerenmaaraalum
/tnararaalum keertthithamaavatte
Svaaraadhakaril peruma vallartthum nintirunaamam.

Aardratha thonnename naathhaa!
Ikkarmmam kaikkollllaname
Mochanavum krpayum vaazhvum
Ninnariyeennekeedaname.

Melulllloronnichiravil
Keezhullllor sthuthi paadatte
Nidraaheenathayodunarva-
Ngullllaane keertthikkatte.

Nidrayilennonam priyare!
Paapatthil mungidollaa
Kaantanumaayu manavarayeraan
Nokkippaarkkin vaathilkkal

Praarththhana ketteedunnone!
Yaachana nalkeedunnone!
Praarththhanayil preethyaa sadayam
Yaachanaye nalkeedaname.
